reviewText: Kim Sun-ah is one angry woman, jilted by three men.  She exacts revenge with two gay friends on three insensitive dogs.  A current boyfriend (Jang Hyuk) tries to explain why she can't sustain a relationship as he walks away.  Rather than own up to her weaknesses, she wreaks havoc on the three past boyfriends.  Lot of humor and pathos.  First rate cast on the ups and downs of relationships.
summary: Beware a Angry Korean Woman Jilted
Title: N/A

reviewText: A tad on the hokie side. Young lady grows up & recounts her love affairs and what went wrong, decides to seek monetary reimbursement for herself thru receipts kept and totaled. Will her ex's pay up? Also learns there is more to romance then meets the eye.Not the greatest movie, but worth the time. Definetley amusing.
Title: N/A

reviewText: So-so romantic comedy/drama. I liked the first hour or so depicting a woman's 3 relationships. However, the remainder of the story of her efforts to get even with the men fell flat.Actress Kim Sun Ah makes even the ineffective scenes tolerable (that's her as the 3 women on the DVD cover -- assuming the DVD pic is of 3 women in bed). She falls in love better than most actresses, suffers better than most, and has an appealing comic touch (even when mugging).The films a visual treat, too. Surprisingly, it's the first film for the director and the cinematographer.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Not even sure what it was about but it was so awful I couldn't continue watching.  Try again with another movie.

reviewText: Accused of only being a boy toy, she takes her diary to find out if that was the way with all of her past boy friends.  Along the way she learns a lot about herself, that memories involving two people belong to both of them and she sets out to find out who she really is.  I would recommend this one  just a little less than  The Righteous Thief

reviewText: Some parts were really funny and I felt the plot had real potential but the actress just couldn't carry it through. It was entertaining but it's  definitely not my favorite movie. Good movie for a lazy day.
